results.title: Metformin upregulates the expression of Gli1 in vascular endothelial cells in hyperoxia-exposed neonatal mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ upregulates the expression of @GENE_GLI1 @GENE_14632 @@@Gli1@@@ in vascular endothelial cells in @<m>DISEASE_Hyperoxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018496 @@@hyperoxia@@@-exposed neonatal @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Decreased AMP-activated protein kinase (AMPK) function and protective effect of metformin in neonatal rat pups exposed to hyperoxia lung injury
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@-treated @<m>DISEASE_Hyperoxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018496 @@@hyperoxia@@@ pups had higher lung weights at P21.

results.title: Metformin regulates macrophage polarization via the Shh signaling pathway to improve pulmonary vascular development in bronchopulmonary dysplasia.
results.text_hl: Newborn @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ were subcutaneously injected with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ from day 2 after exposure to @<m>DISEASE_Hyperoxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018496 @@@hyperoxia@@@.

results.title: Effect of hyperoxia and metformin on vascular responses to vasoactive compounds in rats.
results.text_hl: Effect of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperoxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018496 @@@hyperoxia@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on vascular responses to vasoactive compounds in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Metformin attenuates hyperoxia-induced lung injury in neonatal rats by reducing the inflammatory response.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Lung Cell Mol Physiol
results.text_hl: In conclusion @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ prolongs survival and attenuates @DISEASE_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055370 @@@pulmonary injury@@@ by reducing @DISEASE_Pneumonia @DISEASE_MESH:D011014 @@@pulmonary inflammation@@@, @DISEASE_Blood_Coagulation_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001778 @@@coagulation@@@, and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ but does not affect alveolar development or prevent @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@pulmonary arterial hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Right_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017380 @@@right ventricular hypertrophy@@@ in neonatal @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with severe @<m>DISEASE_Hyperoxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018496 @@@hyperoxia@@@-induced experimental @DISEASE_Bronchopulmonary_Dysplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D001997 @@@BPD@@@.

citations.NLM: Chen X, Walther FJ, Sengers RM, Laghmani el H, Salam A, Folkerts G, Pera T, Wagenaar GT. Metformin attenuates hyperoxia-induced lung injury in neonatal rats by reducing the inflammatory response. Am J Physiol Lung Cell Mol Physiol. 2015 Aug 1;309(3):L262-70. PMID: 26047641
citations.BibTeX: @article{26047641, title={Metformin attenuates hyperoxia-induced lung injury in neonatal rats by reducing the inflammatory response.}, author={Chen X and Walther FJ and Sengers RM and Laghmani el H and Salam A and Folkerts G and Pera T and Wagenaar GT}, journal={Am J Physiol Lung Cell Mol Physiol}, volume={309}, number={3}, pages={L262-70}}
